name: The Three Goblin Problem
description:
The time of discrimination is over ! The height bar for walking into a bar is at least three goblins.

And these goblins got an idea. 

Move by using **WASD** keys and balance the three goblins with **IJKL** keys or the **left** and **right** analog sticks on your gamepad (you can also change the control settings in options). 

Keep your balance until the end and order yourself a nice mug of "NotAnotherShelfTurd".
